attributes.action: Bring back the nit nurse in primary schools
attributes.additional_details: It gets expensive and time consuming for parents who work full time. Not only does a bottle of Hedrin cost a small fortune but so does having to do all the washing that goes with it. When I was younger and the nit nurse was at the school having nits was unheard of, this is why she should make a come back and relieve us parents who actually care for our children. Please sign if your tired and fed up of repeating the same task every week.
attributes.background: I want to start this petition as a single mother who is fed up of treating her daughters hair when others don't treat their children and nits just continuously circulate the schools.
